charges.charge_description: 18:1349.F ATTEMPT AND CONSPIRACY TO COMMIT MAIL FRAUD(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment: Ninety Six Months as follows: Counts 1 &; 3 - 72 months, concurrent as to these counts.
